imdb.title: Love Live! Sunshine!!
imdb.plot: The second term has started and the members of Aqours work harder than ever to save their school from being shut down.

episodes.title: Next Step
episodes.plot: Despite not making it to the nationals, the girls become eager to enter the next Love Live. event taking place next Spring. Mari eventually reveals to the others that Uranohoshi High will officially closed down. Chika remains determined to make a miracle happen.

episodes.title: Sound of Rain
episodes.plot: Given the task of recruiting a hundred prospective students by the end of the year to save the school, the girls split into groups to write new songs for the next Love Live qualifiers.

episodes.title: Rainbow
episodes.plot: Aqours need to find a way to do their Love Live qualifying performances, and open house in a single day.

episodes.title: Don't Call Me Dia-san
episodes.plot: Dia realizes that Kanan and Mari seem to have gotten closer to the other members of Aqours while she hasn't, and starts wishing that they would call her "Dia-chan."

episodes.title: Taking in A Dog
episodes.plot: Yoshiko finds a dog, but she cannot keep the dog herself because she lives in a condo. So she asks Riko to keep the dog until she finds a permanent home for the dog.

episodes.title: Aqours Wave
episodes.plot: The Third Years are discussing about the applicant numbers. Chika is trying hard, but still unsuccessful. However, by the time, she managed to do it.

episodes.title: The Time Left
episodes.plot: Aqours passes onto the National with 1st place ranking. However, the number rises and reaches 98 but the school is decided to be closed. The wish of every student reaches them, and cheers Aqours up once again.

episodes.title: Hakodate
episodes.plot: Aqours has arrived to Hokkaido for the regional finals, and there they discover that Saint Snow were disqualified by a mistake during the performance. Now the Aqours have to do their best in the finals.

episodes.title: Awaken the Power
episodes.plot: Ruby and Leah are making a song for their older sisters who are soon to graduate and having their final Love Live.

episodes.title: Finding a Way to Shine
episodes.plot: Now that their school life is coming to an end, Kanan, Dia, and Mari decide to go search for a shooting star like they did when they were kids.

episodes.title: Uranohoshi High School
episodes.plot: Uranohoshi students hold their last school festival, due to its closure.

episodes.title: Sea of Light
episodes.plot: After turning "Zero to One", Aqours is about to take their final step: the Love Live finals.

episodes.title: Our Shine
episodes.plot: Having proved themselves victorious at Love Live, the girls begin their final day at Uranohoshi Girls' High School, where everyone paints messages all over the school building before Dia, Kanan and Mari undergo their graduation.

episodes.title: I Want to Shine!
episodes.plot: Chika Takami tries to start her own School Idol Club. As Chika and her friend You Watanabe try to recruit members, she faces resistance from the student council president, Dia Kurosawa, who states she will not approve such a club.

episodes.title: Catch the Transfer Student!
episodes.plot: Chika keeps trying to get Riko to join the School Idol Club, only to get rejected every time. After listening to song "Yume no Tobira", Riko decides to take up Chika's offer and join her club.

episodes.title: First Step
episodes.plot: Mari Ohara states that if the girls can fill up the school gym with audience members, she will approve their School Idol Club. While Aqours performs, a power outage occurs while Dia secretly hooks up a backup generator.

episodes.title: Their Feelings
episodes.plot: With the School Idol Club approved, Chika and the others begin cleaning up their new clubroom. Afterwards, Hanamaru convinces Dia to listen to Ruby as she states her true wishes. Ruby joins the idol club.

episodes.title: Yohane Descends
episodes.plot: As Aqours try to figure out how to improve their idol ranking, Tsushima Yoshiko, who had been absent from school since the first day, struggled to put her chuunibyou habits of pretending she is a "fallen angel" behind her.

episodes.title: Let's Make a PV!
episodes.plot: Mari informs Dia about plans to close Uranohoshi and merge with another high school due to lack of applicants. When Ruby tells the other about it, Chika decides to follow u's' example and try to save their school.

episodes.title: Tokyo
episodes.plot: With their video placing them in the top 100 school idol groups, Aqours are invited to perform at an event in Tokyo, prompting some concern from Dia.

episodes.title: Isn't It Frustrating?
episodes.plot: The girls are left stunned by St. Snow's performance, even though they failed to win, and the gap between them and the top school idols hits harder when they discover they ranked in last place with zero votes.

episodes.title: Young Dreamer
episodes.plot: Kanan wanted to give up being a "School idol", however, because of motivation from Chika, she was able to reconcile with Mari and the two finally manage to make up with each other.

episodes.title: We've Got Stewshine
episodes.plot: With the arrival of summer vacation, the girls begin training at the beach in preparation for Love Live while also helping out at a run-down snack bar. Chika encourages Riko to follow her own feelings and go to the piano recital.

episodes.title: Aye-aye, My Friend
episodes.plot: After Riko heads off for Tokyo for her recital, the others ask You to take her place alongside Chika in their dance routine. Riko performs her recital while Aquors perform at the preliminaries, both managing to perform well.

episodes.title: It's Time to Fly
episodes.plot: The Aqours passed in the Love Live qualifying, but few students entered the Uranohoshi. The girls go to the Otonokizaka Academy, where the legendary group came.

episodes.title: Sunshine!!
episodes.plot: As the girls keep practicing for the regional qualifiers, some of Chika's friends, having seen everyone's efforts, decide they want to become idols and help the school.
